definition: Wuhait or Wuhai prefecture level city in Inner Mongolia

ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Wuhait or Wuhai prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Coal mine flooding accident occurred in Inner Mongolia Wuhai.
